entry.title: Royal Seikoak | Yellow Gold
entry.summary:
Vendor: Moddys Custom Watches
Type: Royal Oak
Price: 299.95

Inspired by the iconic Royal Oak design, and featuring the prestigious Seiko NH35 automatic movement, we present the Seiko Mod Royal Oak. A 41 mm high-end quality watch combining the perfect alliance between excellence and accessibility.

Carefully hand-assembled by experts with the next features:

  • Diameter: 41mm (excluding the crown)
  • Movement: Seiko NH35 automatic movement
  • Thickness: 12mm
  • Glass: Sapphire, anti-scratch with anti-reflective treatment
  • Luminova: Yes
  • Case: 316L brushed stainless steel
  • Crown: Screwed
  • Wrist size: 14,5cm to 22cm (adjustable)
  • Lugs: 20mm
  • Bracelet: 316L stainless steel (with a butterfly style security clasp)
  • Case back: Crystal (seen movement)
  • Water resistance: 3 ATM
